description: "The Text Box lets you add notes directly to your dots. Each box comes with pre-written text that you can edit however you like, perfect for quickly adding instructions, explanations, or thoughts. Text Boxes make your feedback clear and organized without spending time typing everything from scratch."

## üìù How to use Text Box

üß∞ Click the Text Box icon from the annotation toolbar.

üì• Choose the default text box style from the annotation bar and drag it to the exact area where you want to add the text.

‚å®Ô∏è Write your explanation, instructions, or notes clearly and move it anywhere on the dot

üíæ Your annotated dot is now clear and ready to share or revisit.

<div class="relative box-content w-full max-h-[80vh] aspect-[1.90476] py-10">

üí° Tips

* Use the Text Box to share your thoughts or guide your team with short, clear messages.

* Combine Text Boxes with Annotations, Emojis, or Stickers to make your dots more visual and fun.

* Keep it short and sweet ‚Äî a few sentences are enough to get your point across.
